summary: REQ-48 appears implemented by updating the Get Involved page to use a shared OFFICE_ADDRESS constant with the correct Jharkhand address text. However, REQ-49 (site-wide removal of the old Bihar address strings) cannot be fully verified from the provided diff summary because it doesnâ€™t show a comprehensive removal of those old strings beyond the updated Get Involved page and refactoring Contact/Footer to use the constant.

missing_requirements.requirement: Audit the frontend for any remaining occurrences of the old address text ("Vill-Bhagatpur, P.O-Bhagatpur", "P.S-Bhagatpur, Dist-Samastipur", "Bihar, India - 848503") and replace/remove them so the old address is not displayed anywhere on the site.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows the Get Involved page now imports and presumably displays OFFICE_ADDRESS, and Footer/Contact were refactored to use the same constant, but it does not provide evidence of a site-wide search/removal of the old address strings across all other pages/components where they might still exist.

hallucinated_features.description: Centralized the office address into a new shared constant module and refactored Contact page and Footer to import it.
hallucinated_features.reason: The request only asked to fix the Get Involved page address and remove old address occurrences; it did not request creating a new constants module or refactoring other pages to use it (even if it helps consistency).
